nodes.text: Star Wars: 10-Button Sound: Heroes is a sound book which features Mace Windu, Yoda, Obi-Wan Kenobi, Leia Skywalker Organa Solo and other characters. It was published by Studio Fun International on July 7, 2020.

Discover the heroes of the Star Wars saga in the third installment in our 10-button sound book series. Press each button to hear iconic lines of dialogue and cool special effects from a galaxy far, far away!

Learn about legendary Rebel heroes Luke Skywalker, Princess Leia, and Han Solo in this interactive sound book. Plus, find out what it takes to be a Resistance soldier and fight the Dark Side! Includes actual sound effects and classic lines of dialogue from the Star Wars saga.
